CustomField.formula: IF( Verified_Mismatches__c = true , FALSE, IF( OR( BillingStreet <> Primary_Contact__r.BillingStreet, BillingCity <> Primary_Contact__r.BillingCity, BillingState <> Primary_Contact__r.BillingState , BillingPostalCode <> Primary_Contact__r.BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry <> Primary_Contact__r.BillingCountry ), TRUE, FALSE ) )
CustomField.label: Mismatched
